resources.string: Our Player Perks App was designed to\nenhance your experience while visiting any of\nour more than 30 locations.
Get rewarded for playing at Dotty’s, earning\npoints that you can redeem them\nfor drawing entries or cash.
The more you play,\nthe more you earn.
Points can be redeemed for incentives and\nother rewards, either through\nthe app or on premise.
Receive notifications for contests, special\nevents, promotions and other incentives only\navailable through the Dotty’s app.

You have found the treasure! Congratulations!
Go to a bridge with a name that does not match the color that it is!
Go to a market with an amazing assortment of delicious foods. It is a San Francisco classic!
Go to a pier popular for tourist attractions, carnival games, fresh fish, and delicious sourdough bread!
Go to a square named after Civil War rallies held there, but now known for its amazing shopping!

"Dotty’s requires access to your device location in the background in order to recognize the device’s entry into secured Dotty’s store locations.
To enable location permissions in the background:
1. Tap on “Continue” on this dialog box.
2. Tap on “Allow in settings” in the next prompt. This will open the location permission screen for Dotty’s.
3. Select “Allow all the time” on the screen."
